title: How do I get certified for a course?
content: To get certified in a course, you need to successfully complete all quizzes and submissions (if applicable) with 100% progression.

title: My progression is 100%, but the certificate isn't loading/generating. What should I do?
content: Please clear your browser history and try again. If the issue persists, log out and log back in, then try again.

title: I don't know the answer to the quiz of a course, can I still get certified?
content: Please ensure you complete the quiz with the correct answer. You can attempt the quiz an unlimited number of times.

title: How can I change my name on my certificate/profile?
content: Go to your profile → Edit your name → Refresh your browser (CTRL + F5) → Regenerate your certificate.

title: Where can I find the certificate? Where is the 'Get Certified' option?
content: Click on the 'Get Certified' option at the end of the course modules in the table of contents. It will only appear after completing all lessons with 100% progress.

title: I cannot download my certificate, a blank screen appears, what should I do?
content: The certificate downloads automatically as a PDF. Check your Downloads folder. If not working, use Google Chrome.

title: Why is Course X not available in Y language?
content: GUVI is working to provide more regional language courses. Send your request to info@guvi.in.

title: What can I do with GEEKOINS?
content: You can use GEEKOINS to purchase courses, get run counts in CodeKata/WebKata/Debugging, and redeem coupons from rewards.

title: What is your refund policy? I want a refund for my course.
content: Refunds take up to 7 working days after you submit the refund form that will be emailed by the GUVI team.

title: Where can I find the courses?
content: Visit https://www.guvi.in/courses to browse the complete course library.

title: I'm not able to log in. Please help.
content: Refresh your browser (CTRL + SHIFT + R), and try again. If the issue continues, use a different browser.
